acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.accessControlManager_: Address of the access control manager contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setValidateConfig((address,uint256,uint2.custom:error: Null address error is thrown if asset address is nullRange error thrown if bound ratio is not positiveRange error thrown if lower bound is greater than upper bound
setValidateConfig((address,uint256,uint2.custom:event: Emits ValidateConfigAdded when a validation config is successfully set

setValidateConfigs((address,uint256,uint.custom:error: Zero length error is thrown if length of the config array is 0
setValidateConfigs((address,uint256,uint.custom:event: Emits ValidateConfigAdded for each validation config that is successfully set

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

validatePriceWithAnchorPrice(address,uin.custom:error: Missing error thrown if asset config is not setPrice error thrown if anchor price is not valid

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

ValidateConfigAdded(address,uint256,uint.notice: Emit this event when new validation configs are added

BNB_ADDR().notice: Set this as asset address for BNB. This is the underlying for vBNB

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

constructor.notice: Constructor for the implementation contract. Sets immutable variables.

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the owner of the contract

setValidateConfigs((address,uint256,uint.notice: Add multiple validation configs at the same time

validatePriceWithAnchorPrice(address,uin.notice: Test reported asset price against anchor price
